title: Hanes Men's Socks, X-Temp Cushioned Low Cut Socks, 12-Pack
description: COMFORT YOU DESERVE – Cushioned bottom makes these cushioned socks for men a sure bet for everyday wear, from work, play, gym, sports, and beyond.
KEEPING YOU COMFORTABLE - Hanes' X-Temp technology adapts to your temperature for all day comfort.
DURABLE – Reinforced heel and toe for added durability and sock longevity
KEEP YOUR COOL - Cool Comfort fabric wicks away moisture so your feet stay cool and dry all day.
SUPPORT YOU NEED – Arch support and spandex give you the support and comfort you need

Hanes X-Temp Cushioned Socks are designed with your active lifestyle in mind. Wicking fabric and mesh ventilation panels team up with our X-Temp technology to help keep feet cool, dry, and comfortable. Knit-in arch support helps provide better fit while the cushioned heel and toe provides high impact comfort. The reinforced heel and toe make these socks durable while our FreshIQ smell Protection Technology will help fight those stinky feet!
